promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic strong rabbit fighting-type pokemon holding a stone hammer. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Hammarbun, a a dynamic strong rabbit fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Diamond Rain. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "fighting" or "Hammarbun". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, rabbit-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Brawny warrior of the burrow, Hammarbun thrives in battleground-like regions, radiating diamond-like resilience with a pulverizing punch.
